text.value: SELECT MANDT,ORDER_REQUEST_NO, CONTRACT, PO_NUMBER, CUST_ORDER_DATE, ORDER_TYPE, SALES_ORDER , STATUS, UDATE,UTIME,SALES_ORG, KUNNR, NAME_WE, KUNAG, NAME_AG, YMAT_SOURCE, YCAB_TYPE, VEHICLE_TYPE, INT_REMARK, EXT_REMARK, NO_ITEM, NDS_SALE_ORDER, PROCESS_STATUS, URG_ORD_IND, PRM_SVC_IND, CRN_BKD_IND, BRG_BKD_IND, POL_ESC_IND,REQ_DAT_FRM, REQ_DAT_TO, PRJ_CST_DAT, ORDER_GROUP_ID, LOW_BED_VEH_IND, TON50_VEH_IND, UNIT_MODE_IND,MUST_HAVE_DAT, REF_ORD_REQ_NO, YORD_TYPE FROM SAPSR3.YMSDT_ORDER_HDR WHERE ORDER_REQUEST_NO = @{pipeline().parameters.ORDER_REQUEST_NO}
